name: AQUA CONSCIENCE, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Urging CDC to incorporate scientific testing into lifeguard positioning health codes
Issues related to CDC appropriations regarding proper lifeguard positioning for drowning prevention
Adding language to CDC appropriations legislation recommending the CDC incorporate scientific testing into the Model Aquatic Health Code protocols for lifeguard positioning
